body_html:
Yes, you can use them together. (BTW ES6 will be compiled to 'old' style JS.)
edit: Given that we are using Webpack, which comes with Babel, which will take care of the compiling to old style JS)

body:
Yes, you can use them together. (BTW ES6 will be compiled to 'old' style JS.) 
edit: Given that we are using Webpack, which comes with Babel, which will take care of the compiling to old style JS)
